title: What the hell? I lost my promos again because of Champion Select...
body: I was kicked out for not choosing a champion when there was 7 seconds left and got a LeaverBuster and lost my promos? Wtf, Rito plz.

replies.body: Dude i got kicked from champ select for "failing to select a champion". I had locked in leona and was selecting her skin, you can't get to her skin select without locking her in so yeah, GG riot cost me a promo's placement. It happens man, happened to me in season 4 as well and the client has changed since then so idk what it is.
